article_title: Trump Casino Union Files 27 NLRB Charges Amid Ch. 11 Fight
article_text:
Trump Casino Union Files 27 NLRB Charges Amid Ch. 11 Fight

Law360, Los Angeles (February 3, 2015, 8:54 PM ET) -- The Trump Taj Mahal casino union on Tuesday filed 27 charges of unfair labor practices with the National Labor Relations Board, accusing managers of threatening and discriminating against workers for union activity as they fight Trump Entertainment Resorts Inc.'s axing of a collective bargaining agreement in its Chapter 11 bankruptcy.
